## JsPlumbInstance.batch() method

Suspend drawing, run the given function, and then re-enable drawing, optionally repainting everything.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
batch(fn: Function, doNotRepaintAfterwards?: boolean): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  fn | Function | Function to run while drawing is suspended. |
|  doNotRepaintAfterwards | boolean | Whether or not to repaint everything after drawing is re-enabled. |

<b>Returns:</b>

void
